article_title: House Minority Leader Nancy Pelosi Weekly
article_text:
October 22, 2015

House Minority Leader Weekly Briefing House Minority Leader Nancy Pelosi (D-CA) briefed reporters and responded to questions on her party’s legislative agenda. Topics included several looming fiscal deadlines, the House Benghazi committee, and the election of a new speaker.
